Comments_List: This class was invaluable to me in many ways. I was able to get the advice from Professor Dudley--a profound, brilliant and kind professor--on my research. I was able to also get advice from my interlocutors...and often we dont have the time to really sit down and work with one another. In this context, I gained new insights from my peers both concerning my work and in collaborating with them to give advice on other peoples work. Really, such a valuable class!
The class is wonderful. The Professor's plan for the course is wonderful. I think attendance should be mandatory.
Yes! A wonderful space to think through new ideas and forms of ethnography
Yes, any student that wants a supportive and informative space to develop their work and to help develop the work of others should go here.
